Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.lucene.search.EarlyTerminatingSortingCollector
    Pass trackTotalHits=false to TopFieldCollector instead of using this class.
    org.apache.lucene.index.LegacyBinaryDocValues
    Use BinaryDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.index.LegacyBinaryDocValuesWrapper
    Implement BinaryDocValues directly.
    org.apache.lucene.index.LegacyNumericDocValues
    Use NumericDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.index.LegacyNumericDocValuesWrapper
    Implement NumericDocValues directly.
    org.apache.lucene.index.LegacySortedDocValues
    Use SortedDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.index.LegacySortedDocValuesWrapper
    Implement SortedDocValues directly.
    org.apache.lucene.index.LegacySortedNumericDocValues
    Use SortedNumericDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.index.LegacySortedNumericDocValuesWrapper
    Implement SortedNumericDocValues directly.
    org.apache.lucene.index.LegacySortedSetDocValues
    Use SortedSetDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.index.LegacySortedSetDocValuesWrapper
    Implement SortedSetDocValues directly.
    org.apache.lucene.index.MergePolicyWrapper
    replace with FilterMergePolicy
    org.apache.lucene.store.RAMDirectory
    This class uses inefficient synchronization and is discouraged in favor of MMapDirectory. It will be removed in future versions of Lucene.
    org.apache.lucene.store.RAMFile
    This class uses inefficient synchronization and is discouraged in favor of MMapDirectory. It will be removed in future versions of Lucene.
    org.apache.lucene.store.RAMInputStream
    This class uses inefficient synchronization and is discouraged in favor of MMapDirectory. It will be removed in future versions of Lucene.
    org.apache.lucene.store.RAMOutputStream
    This class uses inefficient synchronization and is discouraged in favor of MMapDirectory. It will be removed in future versions of Lucene.
    org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard.StandardFilter
    StandardFilter is a no-op and can be removed from code
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.apache.lucene.search.QueryCachingPolicy.ALWAYS_CACHE
    This policy is inefficient as caching too aggressively disables the ability to skip non-interesting documents. See UsageTrackingQueryCachingPolicy.
    org.apache.lucene.search.FuzzyQuery.defaultMinSimilarity
    pass integer edit distances instead.
    org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard.StandardAnalyzer.ENGLISH_STOP_WORDS_SET
    Use the stop words on EnglishAnalyzer in the analysis-common module

    Use Version.LATEST
    org.apache.lucene.util.Constants.LUCENE_VERSION
    Use Version.LATEST
    org.apache.lucene.util.RamUsageEstimator.NUM_BYTES_BOOLEAN
    use 1 instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.RamUsageEstimator.NUM_BYTES_BYTE
    use 1 instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.RamUsageEstimator.NUM_BYTES_CHAR
    use Character.BYTES instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.RamUsageEstimator.NUM_BYTES_DOUBLE
    use Double.BYTES instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.RamUsageEstimator.NUM_BYTES_FLOAT
    use Float.BYTES instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.RamUsageEstimator.NUM_BYTES_INT
    use Integer.BYTES instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.RamUsageEstimator.NUM_BYTES_LONG
    use Long.BYTES instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.RamUsageEstimator.NUM_BYTES_SHORT
    use Short.BYTES instead.
    org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard.StandardAnalyzer.STOP_WORDS_SET
    Use the stop words on EnglishAnalyzer in the analysis-common module
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.lucene.index.PostingsEnum.attributes()
    this method is unused and will be removed in 7.0
    org.apache.lucene.codecs.LegacyDocValuesIterables.binaryIterable(FieldInfo, DocValuesProducer, int)
    Consume BinaryDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.StringHelper.compare(int, byte[], int, byte[], int)
    Use FutureArrays.compareUnsigned instead.
    org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.Similarity.SimScorer.computePayloadFactor(int, int, int, BytesRef)
    org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.Similarity.SimScorer.computeSlopFactor(int)
    org.apache.lucene.search.TopFieldCollector.create(Sort, int, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    Use TopFieldCollector.create(Sort, int, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    org.apache.lucene.search.TopFieldCollector.create(Sort, int, FieldDoc, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    Use TopFieldCollector.create(Sort, int, FieldDoc, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher.createNormalizedWeight(Query, boolean)
    Clients should rewrite the query and then call IndexSearcher.createWeight(Query, boolean, float) with a boost value of 1f
    org.apache.lucene.search.FuzzyQuery.floatToEdits(float, int)
    pass integer edit distances instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.CharsRef.getUTF16SortedAsUTF8Comparator()
    This comparator is only a transition mechanism
    org.apache.lucene.util.SloppyMath.haversinKilometers(double, double, double, double)
    Use instead
    org.apache.lucene.codecs.LegacyDocValuesIterables.normsIterable(FieldInfo, NormsProducer, int)
    Consume NumericDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.codecs.LegacyDocValuesIterables.numericIterable(FieldInfo, DocValuesProducer, int)
    Consume NumericDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.IOUtils.reThrow(Throwable)
    This method is deprecated in favor of IOUtils.rethrowAlways(java.lang.Throwable). Code should be updated to IOUtils.rethrowAlways(java.lang.Throwable) and guarded with an additional null-argument check (because IOUtils.rethrowAlways(java.lang.Throwable) is not accepting null arguments).
    org.apache.lucene.util.IOUtils.reThrowUnchecked(Throwable)
    This method is deprecated in favor of IOUtils.rethrowAlways(java.lang.Throwable). Code should be updated to IOUtils.rethrowAlways(java.lang.Throwable) and guarded with an additional null-argument check (because IOUtils.rethrowAlways(java.lang.Throwable) is not accepting null arguments).
    org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.TFIDFSimilarity.scorePayload(int, int, int, BytesRef)
    org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.TFIDFSimilarity.sloppyFreq(int)
    org.apache.lucene.codecs.LegacyDocValuesIterables.sortedNumericToDocCount(DocValuesProducer, FieldInfo, int)
    Consume SortedDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.codecs.LegacyDocValuesIterables.sortedNumericToValues(DocValuesProducer, FieldInfo)
    Consume SortedDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.codecs.LegacyDocValuesIterables.sortedOrdIterable(DocValuesProducer, FieldInfo, int)
    Consume SortedDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.codecs.LegacyDocValuesIterables.sortedSetOrdCountIterable(DocValuesProducer, FieldInfo, int)
    Consume SortedSetDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.codecs.LegacyDocValuesIterables.sortedSetOrdsIterable(DocValuesProducer, FieldInfo)
    Consume SortedSetDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.codecs.LegacyDocValuesIterables.valuesIterable(SortedDocValues)
    Consume SortedDocValues instead.
    org.apache.lucene.codecs.LegacyDocValuesIterables.valuesIterable(SortedSetDocValues)
    Consume SortedSetDocValues instead.
